Furthermore aim investigate whether addition protein high fat breakfast result reduce postprandial accumulation lipid compare high fat breakfast alone .
DOC.brief_title: Postprandial IHL IMCL Measured With Proton Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy
DOC.detailed_description: Fat accumulation non-adipose tissue , liver muscle , associate reduced insulin sensitivity cardiovascular disease . Little known dietary determinant time course ectopic fat accumulation . Therefore general aim project develop validate methodology follow postprandial hepatic muscular lipid retention . Proton Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy ( 1H-MRS ) well-established tool noninvasive quantification intrahepatic lipid ( IHL ) intramyocellular lipid ( IMCL ) . Previous study suggest relatively rapid regulation IHL IMCL level , indicate change total lipid pool high fat diet 3 4 day . Although IHL IMCL level seem change rapidly , data IHL IMCL level single meal lacking .
DOC.criteria: Age 1840 year Healthy Stable dietary habit No use medication Lean subject : BMI 1825 kg/m2 Obese subject : BMI 3035 kg/m2 Any medical condition require treatment and/or medication use Alcohol consumption 20 g per day ( Â± 2 unit ) Smoking Unstable body weight ( weight gain loss > 3 kg past three month ) Participation another biomedical study within 1 month prior screen visit Contraindications MRI scan : Central nervous system aneurysm clip Implanted neural stimulator Implanted cardiac pacemaker defibrillator Cochlear implant Iron contain corpus aliena eye brain Hearing aid artificial ( heart ) valve contraindicate MRS Claustrophobia
